joker2.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
joker2.description: Failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harley Quinn, while in Arkham State Hospital.

dune2.title: Dune: Part Two
dune2.description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against those who destroyed his family.

paddington3.title: Paddington in Peru
paddington3.description: Paddington returns to Peru to visit his beloved Aunt Lucy at the Home for Retired Bears.
